title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Air Force Targets Terror Infrastructure Amid Rising Tensions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah operatives alongside the organization’s terror infrastructure.

During the evening hours yesterday (Saturday), Air Force fighter jets attacked a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the area of Kfar Kila and an additional observation post in the vicinity.
In addition, a group of Hezbollah operatives identified in the area of A-Taybeh was targeted by forces from Unit 869.

Following alerts about the infiltration of hostile aircraft in the north of the country this morning, a UAV crossed from Lebanese territory and fell in the area of Beit HaEl. There were no casualties.
During the incident, an interceptor was launched at the aircraft, and a warning of rocket and missile fire was activated due to fears of debris from the interception. The incident is under investigation.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3XuwYgq
